about: Over a decade of software development experience working in various industries including financial services, web application security and AML/CFT compliance. Skilled in Angular, React, SQL, .NetCore, Spring Framework, and Agile Methodologies amongst others. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor of Science(B.Sc.Honours) focused in Computing and Information Systems from University of London.

detail.item: Lead the design and implementation of new features, optimizing frontend and backend architectures using Angular, .NET core and SQL Server technologies
Actively participate in product development workshops, contributing to the overall vision and direction of the product roadmap
Mentor and guide developers, fostering technical growth and enhancing team performance
Drive process improvements, streamlining delivery processes and enhancing deployment pipelines
Conduct interviews and contribute to the hiring process
Engage with non-technical stakeholders, providing training and ensuring their understanding of new features and enhancements
I led the design and implementation of a complete frontend rewrite including a new architecture and user experience for Acunetix products using Angular, Typescript, RxJS, NgRx, SCSS.
Constantly delivering new features while enhancing the existing ones

experience.summary: As a senior software engineer, I provide frontend/backend solutions that meet customers' requirements.

Responsible for developing and maintaining features for different products.
Technologies used:

Responsible for developing and maintaining features, interfacing to REST APIs. Also involved in the upgrade of a project to Angular 2+.
Technologies used:

Neurotech's main product is Mente, a medical system that helps children on the Autism spectrum. Mente application interfaces with Neurotech's proprietary Mente EEG headband over WIFI to directly influence the child's music therapy.

detail.item: Responsible for the overall architecture of software solutions of medical devices
Person of reference for critical projects
Collaborate with the hardware team to design an effective communication protocol when interfacing with medical hardware
Push towards overall quality and maintainability of code with a can do attitude.
Native Mobile Development including IOS(Objective C) and Android(Java)
The full product lifecycle from requirements analysis, design and development to testing and deployment
The support of junior team members; and
The creation of standard operating procedures and technical documentation templates relating to the software lifecycle. This is done in conformance with ISO 13485.

experience.summary: Responsible for building and maintaining Dynamics CRM solutions. Involved in all stages of the software development lifecycle comprising analysis, design, development, testing, deployment and support
